title: Amazon API Gateway REST API to Amazon SES
description: Create an Amazon API Gateway REST API that integrates with Amazon SES

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern creates an Amazon API Gateway REST API that integrates with an Amazon SES.
The API includes an API key and usage plan. The API integrates directly with the SES API and supports SendEmail API action.
